name: eXtended C Standard Library
short_description:
The xstdlib (eXtended Standard Library) is a library that ports many essential or miscellaneous high-level language functions (like in PHP, Python or Perl) to C or any functions that are of common use to C developers.

Please visit the Project Wiki http://marislabs.org/wiki/index.php/EXtended_Standard_Library for documentation.

Updates happen at http://marislabs.org/projects/ first, please check there before downloading here.
